== Description ==

Get a full blog URL, given a domain and a path.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_blogaddress_by_domain( $domain, $path ) ?>%%%
== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$domain|string|The domain|required}}

{{Parameter|$path|string|The path|required}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||string|The full blog URL}}
